name: Heaven Office
description:
Welcome to the Heaven Office! Distribute (not)suitable rebirths to the souls to earn your own rebirth! 

The heavenly office immerses you in the absurd atmosphere of the Kafkaesque bureaucracy with a touch of insanity. Can you make the *right* decision? What decision can be called *right* at all? Does *righteousness* really exist?..  Distribute souls as your heart tells you, and earn rebirth! 

You only need a  computer mouse to play.

Team:
(Dev) Roman Gagarin - Discord: PunkGagarin (Roman)#0971
(Dev) Iliya Pisarskiy - Discord: ipowerilya#5013
(Narrative) Iliya Smolnyakov - Discord: Ilia Smolniakov#3687
(Sound) Lev Kitkin - Discord: Lev Kitkin#6044
(Music) German Kitkin - Discord: germankitkin#5390
(Producer & Art) Evgeny Kitkin - Discord: Evgeny Kitkin#6609

The game is made for the GDNJam 2021. Theme: Rebirth.
